thread.section_title: ProofreadingPal.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ProofreadingPal.com | proofreadingpal.com
thread.title: Taj Wilson

author: Taj Wilson
title: Taj Wilson
text:
I'm usually not the type to post a review on a site, but this was one of the best experiences I've ever had. The promptness, professionalism, and pure skill was amazing. Not only did I receive my paper with corrections, they provided good feedback that actually made sense. I've submitted a statement and essay for another school without using this service, but I felt so much more confident hitting submit, after using this service.
I'd recommend anyone looking for proofreading help to use this site.
